p: Animals in the control (mock-vaccinated) group and the vaccinated group responded with pyrexia following challenge, although the mean rectal temperatures were higher in the control group, with peak temperatures occurring in all animals 3 days' post-challenge (dpc) followed by a decline back to baseline ( Figure 7A). Animals C2-2 and C2-3 in the vaccinated group developed fevers above 41Â°C at 3 dpc ( Figure 7B).
